description: For an inspired vegan Christmas recipe, try this plant-based Christmas roast with cranberry glaze. Pair it with delicious condiments and green veggies.
keywords: Meat substitute,Pescatarian,Vegetable & nut loaf,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Plant-based,Sesame free,Dec 2021,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: PlantBased Christmas Roast With Cranberry Glaze Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths Plantitude plantbased Christmas roast with cranberry glaze

recipeInstructions.text: Cook plantbased roast according to packet instructions.
Meanwhile, line a baking tray with baking paper. Place pepitas on tray and toast in oven for the last 5 minutes of roast cooking time.
Slice roast and place on a platter with sage. Scatter over pepitas and serve with cranberry sauce.
